alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 01 at 12:15PM MDT until April 01 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Highest amounts above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Frank Church Wilderness, Sawtooth, Copper Basin, and Big Lost Highlands regions. * WHEN...Until 10 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Drifting snow may prompt road closures.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
